org.drip.state.estimator

Class RatesSegmentSequenceBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.state.estimator.RatesSegmentSequenceBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SegmentSequenceBuilder

    public class RatesSegmentSequenceBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements SegmentSequenceBuilder
    RatesSegmentSequenceBuilder holds the logic behind building the bootstrap segments contained in the given Stretch. It extends SegmentSequenceBuilder by implementing/customizing the calibration of the starting as well as the subsequent segments.

        cmp - Component Market Parameter
        quotingParams - Quoting Parameter
        mssPrev - The Previous Stretch Used to value cash flows that fall in those segments
